casebody.data:
Chamberlain
v.
State of NC 185P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Robert S. Chamberlain, for Chamberlain, Robert S. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th of May 2016 by Petitioner for Petition to Renounce Citizenship: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Ervin, J. recused
